main: ^Jamal, can't we go play over there? We've been here since last night!
^Jamal, please don't be like this, we need to pick more flowers!
^Little brat! I'm your mother not your maid, if you want food go pick some flowers for us..
^Oi, Apa! What are you staring at?! Do you want flowers?!
^Umm.. yeah well, I wasn't planning to buy flowers but I guess that could be nice....
^Sorry apa, I was not in my right mind. Did I just shout at you too?
^This kid really got into my nerves. Anyways, all I have are red roses now.
^No, no it's okay I don't need any flowers... but do you need anything?
^(**suspicious**) What would I need from you?
^No no nothing like that.... I just, I mean, you seem very stressed, is there anything I can do to help?
^Well, yes, actually, I need to pick some more daffodils, you know those small yellow flowers?
^They grow on the other side of the park, but my brat son refuses to come with me.
^Of course, you're not supposed to pick the flowers in the park....
^I understand, it's not a problem. We're all just trying to live. Do you need some help with that?
^Well,  if you really don't mind. I can't do it while Jamal is so loud all the time.
^Do you have any idea where I can find some of these flowers you just talked about?
^Yes, you'll find the flowers in an enclosed area near the lake.
